remarks: Lemma for ~ osumclN .  (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
osumcllem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
osumcllem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
osumcllem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
osumcllem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
osumcllem.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
osumcllem.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
osumcllem.m $e |- M = ( X .+ { p } ) $.
osumcllem.u $e |- U = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( X .+ Y ) ) ) $.
osumcllem2N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A /\ Y C_ A ) /\ p e. U ) -> X C_ ( U i^i M ) ) $.
